show.title: The Westward Anime Season 2
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/yYem4Q
show.description: What if the legendary Westward Journey was a grand conspiracy scripted by heaven itself? As armies hunt for a sacred scripture lost for decades, a new journey begins—not for glory, but for redemption. “Westward Deception” is a mythic saga where sin, salvation, and rebellion collide in a battle against divine control.
show.description_secondary: What if the legendary Westward Journey was a grand conspiracy scripted by heaven itself? As armies hunt for a sacred scripture lost for decades, a new journey begins—not for glory, but for redemption. “Westward Deception” is a mythic saga where sin, salvation, and rebellion collide in a battle against divine control.
